markdown:
POSTGRADUATE
============

### Faculty of Civil Engineering UTM

_The Postgraduate Studies assist students to develop and enhance the quality of graduate education by taught course and research. We offer the opportunity to expand knowledge and expertise in any particular field in civil engineering disciplines. Here, you will be supported by world-class staff and dedicated resources._

_As one of the most outstanding faculty in UTM and Malaysia, we attract students from various backgrounds and countries. It is our wish that you all take this opportunity to meet and socialise within the postgraduate community and add another dimension to life at FKA. All the best and enjoy your stay and studies._

![](https://civil.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/student-fka.jpg "student fka")

### **Dear Students,**

### **You are required to fill up Online Teaching Evaluation and Student Experience (ePPPK) through your portal [https://my.utm.my](https://my.utm.my/)
 until 21 January 2024. This evaluation is for Taught Course Students, Research Students (HS) and Research Methodology only.Together with this is attached a Student’s Guide to answer the ePPPK.**

### **All cooperation is greatly appreciated. Thank you.**

[Student's Guide for ePPPK](https://civil.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Students-Guide-for-ePPPK.pdf)
